mapDrawing.title: Map Drawing
mapDrawing.description: Learn how to draw Vietnam map with detailed video tutorial
mapDrawing.videoNotFound: Video not found. Please contact administrator.
mapDrawing.errorLoading: Error loading video. Please try again later.
mapDrawing.step1: Watch the tutorial video carefully from start to finish
mapDrawing.step2: Prepare paper, pens, and necessary drawing tools
mapDrawing.step3: Practice drawing following each step in the video
mapDrawing.step4: You can pause the video to draw each section

settings.title: General Settings
settings.videoUrlDescription: Enter YouTube video embed URL or other video URL. Example: https://www.youtube.com/embed/VIDEO_ID
settings.feedbackUrlDescription: Enter Google Form embed URL. Example: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/FORM_ID/viewform?embedded=true
settings.tip1: To embed a YouTube video, use format: https://www.youtube.com/embed/VIDEO_ID
settings.tip2: Find VIDEO_ID from original YouTube URL (part after "v=" or "youtu.be/")
settings.tip3: This video will be displayed on the "Map Drawing" page

quiz.title: Quiz Management
quiz.description: Create and manage quizzes for Vietnam Economic Zones
quiz.noQuizzes: No quizzes yet. Click "Create Quiz" to get started.
quiz.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.
quiz.createConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to create the quiz "{{title}}"?

statusDescriptions.published: Visible to all users - students can take this quiz
statusDescriptions.draft: Not visible to users - only accessible in edit mode
statusDescriptions.archived: Hidden from users - can be restored later

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load quizzes. Please refresh the page.
errors.createFailed: Failed to create quiz. Please try again.
errors.deleteFailed: Failed to delete quiz. Please try again.
